english: He was always on the lookout for palace revolts .
chinese: 他老是提防发生宫廷叛乱。

english: Beware of the man of one book .
chinese: 提防那只念一本书的人。

english: They are cowardly, and are always anticipating danger .
chinese: 他们胆小怯懦，总是提防着危险。

english: Be on your guard against pickpockets .

chinese: 提防造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: You have mentioned only one of the enemies i have to fear .
chinese: 你只指出了我要提防的敌人中的一个。

english: Harrison and i were wary of each other whenever we met .
chinese: 哈里森和我见面时，我们都互相提防着对方。

english: Against that dreadful design the church stands ever on guard .
chinese: 对于这个可怕的计谋，教会是时刻提防的。

english: There was something about him which ought to put her on her guard .
chinese: 他身上有一种气息，她应当时刻提防。

english: It was a warning, he supposed, which he should heed more often .
chinese: 他认为，这是他应该经常提防的一个警告。

english: I had to keep from being crushed, to fend off continuous attack .
chinese: 我必须不让自己被压服和提防连续不断的攻击。

english: She wondered why thurston had not warned her of this risky snag .
chinese: 她奇怪为什么泽尔斯顿没有警告她提防这个危险的暗礁。

english: His voice was mild but it had an expectant fearful quality in it .
chinese: 他的口气很婉转，但是听得出有些担心而暗带提防的意思。

english: You look out for everything, he thought and you still get hit from behind .
chinese: 他心想：任你小心提防还是逃不过背后来的一家伙。

english: He put me on my guard against a large number of beliefs to which i had no temptation .
chinese: 他要我提防许许多多我本来就不会受诱惑的信条。
